### Chat Interface {{< iconify streamline-flex-color:help-chat-1-flat >}}

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="75%"}

:::{.smaller}
1. install [`chattr` package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/chattr/index.html) from CRAN `r emo::ji("package")`
2. `chattr::options(.chattr_chat = ellmer::chat_github())` connects to {{< iconify copilot-24 >}}
3. `chattr::chattr_app()` initiates the chat window (also see Note)
4. `chattr::chattr_test()` will give feedback on your connection
:::

:::

::: {.column width="25%"}

::: {.callout-note}

{{< iconify simple-icons:posit style= 'color:black;' >}} Posit {{< iconify simple-icons:posit style= 'color:black;' >}} recommends [utilizing keyboard shortcuts](https://mlverse.github.io/chattr/#keyboard-shortcut) to access the app

:::
